availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky farmer. Todd County, Kentucky native. Son of Preston Brown and Rosana Brown. Married to Ophelia Tisdale Brown.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 2, p. 289A.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Lovelaceville, District 2, p. 31.
Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville, p. 10.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910). Microfilm rolls #994027-994058. Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky.
